boardgame.name: Děsnej krvák
Monster Slaughter
殺戮時刻
boardgame.description: Description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Flip the script on the horror films of the 80s with Monster Slaughter !_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the head of a family of monsters (werewolves, vampires, zombies, or golems), this time, you're the one who will have to hunt down and slay those insufferable teenagers who have taken refuge in a house in the middle of the forest._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The hardest part? Choosing the order in which you will eliminate them, and then... executing!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: The Game Pit - Episode 122: Essen 2018 Battle Report Part 2

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: KS edition incl. all stretch goals of the campaign

Kickstarter edition (English) including all stretch goals. optional buy: Monster Slaughter Game Bowls (+20€) Will ship using Bpost. Package up to 5kg: Belgium: 6,50 € Zone 1: 16,40 € Zone 2: 32,80 € Zone 3: 32,80 € Zone 4: 32,80 € Zone 5: 65,60 € Zone 1: Netherlands, Grand Duchy of Luxembourg, Germany, France (excluding DOM-COM-TAAF), United Kingdom. Zone 2: Bulgaria, Cyprus, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Croatia, Latvia, Lithuania, Malta, Monaco, Austria, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Czech Republic, Sweden. Zone 3: Albania, Andorra, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Canary Islands, Ceuta, Isle of Man, Faroe Islands, Georgia, Gibraltar, Guernesey, Iceland, Jersey, Lichtenstein, Macedonia, Melilla, Moldova, Montenegro, Norway, Ukraine, Russia, Serbia, Turkey, Vatican City , Belarus, Switzerland. Zone 4:Algeria, Egypt, Israel, Jordan, Morocco, Syria, Tunisia, United States of America. Zone 5: All other countries. Requests for different shipping options possible. I prefer payment by IBAN.

At the head of a family of monsters (werewolves, vampires, zombies, or golems), this time, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re the one who will have to hunt down and slay those insufferable teenagers who have taken refuge in a house in the middle of the forest. This is Monster Slaughter in the Kickstarter Exclusive Box. 56 unique miniatures, including 25 exclusive minis! https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/ankamaboardgames/monster-slaughter-by-ankama-board-games Game is in the original box and has not been opened yet. Accept Paypal or IBAN with BIC. Bank transfer is preferred. Accepting CryptoCurrencies. Private Sale. Game is in Vienna. Any questions just ask. You will only pay the shipping you want and need.
KS edition. Components punched and sorted. Ships within US for $15.

Exterior cellophane wrap has been removed but all other components have been untouched and unopened (with the exception of taking the photo for this listing). This is the KickStarter edition with 26 exclusive minis. The rules and campaign book are in English-only. Shipping will be $15. The seller will pay any excessive shipping costs. Moving soon. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s got to go!
Kickstarter edition with all the extras. Opened. Everything is in perfect condition. Only the English Rulebook is included. No insert. Sleeved with premium sleeves. Shipping is 40 euros.

It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s sealed! I bought an extra for a gift but ended up doing something else instead. This is the recently shipped Kickstarter edition with all stretch goals. https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/ankamaboardgames/monster-slaughter-by-ankama-board-games?ref=profile_backed

Game is opened and has been played (twice). Everything is in great condition. Cards are NOT sleeved, but the sleeves which came with the game will be included with the sale. Actual shipping to be paid by buyer. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll also include two trays for holding the tokens that I printed out with a 3D printer. Currently these trays do NOT fit in the original box, but can be fit with some cutting of the original insert.

This is the Kickstarter version with all the unlocked stretch goals and the KS exclusive minis. Gobs of exclusive minis for this KS that won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t be available again. Will be shipped in the original shipping box.
full KS Edition, new in shrink!
Kickstarter Edition with all the extra monsters,etc and the shed expansion. Opened and sleeved cards, never played.
